name: Connected Hearts: The Musketeers Saga Collector's Edition
name_original: Connected Hearts: The Musketeers Saga Collector's Edition
description:
The kingdom is in danger! Can you stop the rogue conspirators and help reunite the separated loving hearts of two young people by overcoming numerous obstacles? As both Arron and Mercedes start working to stop the traitors, Cardinal and Count d’Monteo, the full extent of the culprits' scheme is revealed. They bribed the guards, poisoned the prince and started capturing musketeers loyal to the prince – all to prevent Gweneale’s coronation. The odds may be against brave lovers, but they have what it takes… right? Gather your wits for an unforgettable love story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💘 Play as two characters!
You have the opportunity to explore the heroes' characters and unique personalities by playing as each of them in turn! A loving pair of actors will not leave you indifferent to this adventure!

💘 Exclusive collections!
This enchanting love story is filled with collectibles, which you can get during the game! So hurry to play, to fully immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere!

💘 Unravel all the mysteries!
A huge number of hidden objects and brain teasers are waiting for you to play! You will be thrilled with a surprising amount of completely different puzzle quests!

💘 Bonus Chapter!
Play another exciting adventure quest after you finish the main story! Save the crowned King Gweneil in a bonus chapter after a formidable new adversary has replaced him with a double!
